title: Mingxin Liu
text:
I am a conservation ecologist and I joined Lanzhou University in June after my postdoctoral research at the ConservationEE lab in Peking University.
My research interests focus on:
1) identifying optimal land-use planning strategy for maximizing the co-benefits of biodiversity and other essential ecosystem services;
2) understanding the biodiversity responses to land-use change and the underlying ecological processes.
I use empirical data, meta-analytical and simulation approaches to identify opportunities for safeguarding biodiversity and delivering broader benefits.
